forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Clear then Slight Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers after 2am. Mostly clear, with a low around 43. East wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 65. South wind 2 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. South wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 77. South southwest wind 8 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely after 2am. Cloudy. Low around 46, with temperatures rising to around 48 overnight. Southeast wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Rain Showers Likely then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 11am. Mostly cloudy. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. South wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers between 8pm and 5am, then showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 54, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. South wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 64. Southwest wind 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
